definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: When they tighten their belts, austerity ripples out and chokes growth.
sentences.chinese: 當他們束緊褲腰帶，簡樸生活會波及到經濟增長。

sentences.english: I get to tighten my belt that month.
sentences.chinese: 這個月我不可不勒緊褲腰帶過生活。

sentences.english: He shoved the gun into his waistband and buttoned his jacket over it.
sentences.chinese: 迅速插在褲腰帶上，把上衣拉展，蓋好，扣上鈕子。
